document.full_text: "american idol" judge and aerosmith frontman steven tyler will premiere the video of his first u.s. solo single on the television talent show next week, broadcaster fox said.
document.title: steven tyler to debut first u.s. solo single on "idol"
lines_and_colors: "american idol" judge and aerosmith frontman steven tyler will premiere the video of his first u.s. solo single on the television talent show next week, broadcaster fox said.
